General.Name: Cipherlab Co Ltd
General.Description: Cipherlab Co.,Ltd. designs, manufactures, markets, and sells automatic identification and data capture products under the CipherLab brand worldwide. The company offers windows/android and proprietary mobile computers; general purpose, business durable, and pocket sized barcode scanners; HF and UHF radio frequency identification readers; and software solutions comprising deployment and development tools, device management, browser and emulation, programming, and scanner software. It serves warehouse, transportation and logistics, field mobility, retail, manufacturing, and healthcare industries, as well as the government. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
